original_text: Go out to the animals and bring two goats to me. They must be very good young goats. Then I will prepare some food that your father likes to eat. I will cook the meat in the way that he likes.
korean_text: 염소 떼에 가서 거기서 좋은 염소 새끼 두 마리를 내게로 가져오면 내가 그것으로 네 아버지를 위하여 그가 즐기시는 별미를 만들리니

sentences.original_text: and bring two goats to me
They must be very good young goats
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 매우 좋은 어린 염소들이어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: Then I will prepare some food
that your father likes to eat
in the way that he likes
